_comment: Quick configuration with two-point crossover and adaptive mutation
_comment_profile: Fast execution with intelligent adaptation - two-point crossover preserves feature groups while adaptive mutation self-regulates based on selection patterns

_comment_crossover_descriptions.two_point: Two-point crossover - exchanges middle segment between two points

_comment_mutation_descriptions.adaptive: Mutation rate adapts based on current feature selection ratio

_comment_parameters.uniform_swap_prob: Used with uniform crossover - probability of swapping each gene
_comment_parameters.arithmetic_alpha: Used with arithmetic crossover - weight factor (0 < alpha < 1)
_comment_parameters.block_size: Used with block mutation - size of contiguous block to mutate
_comment_parameters.adaptive_min_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - minimum mutation probability (higher for quick exploration)
_comment_parameters.adaptive_max_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - maximum mutation probability (reduced for quick convergence)

_comment_performance_notes.crossover_focus: Two-point crossover maintains feature group structure while allowing efficient recombination
_comment_performance_notes.adaptive_range: Narrower adaptive range (0.015-0.06) optimized for quick runs with effective adaptation
